patthana17.3:4.1: Abyākataṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.3:4.2: Abyākataṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.3:4.3: Abyākataṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupādinnupādāniyo ca naakusalo naupādinnupādāniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.3:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.3:6.1: Kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nakusalassa naanupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.3:6.2: Kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo naakusalassa naanupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.3:6.3: Kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nakusalassa naanupādinnupādāniyassa ca naakusalassa naanupādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana17.3:7.4: Ārammaṇe nava, anantare ekādasa … pe … upanissaye pannarasa, purejāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme cha, āhāre tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.3:8.1: Kusalaṃ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.3:9.1: Abyākataṃ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.3:10.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
